response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds significant value to me. Given its importance, I believe it's only fair to share this treasure with someone who appreciates its true worth. Considering its exceptional qualities and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I propose a transaction at a price of $12,000. This offer is tailored to ensure that you receive a valuable asset while also allowing me to realize a fair return for my investment. I look forward to discussing the details further and exploring how we can make this a mutually beneficial arrangement.", "product_price": 12000}
